item.description:
When the moon is full her magic is very strong, stable and lasting. Under the full moon patronage you can find the courage of true hearing and true seeing, going through the shadows and reemerging in your beauty and your strength.

When the moon is in Capricorn, it is a good time to work on grounding, endurance, generosity, emotional stability, clear vision and achievement of personal goals.

We will perform a sacred ritual to achieve liberation from the energies that have been oppressive, and welcome the manifestation of your independence and your dreams for the upcoming year.


-----------------


We extend this invitation to women of all paths of belief. We encourage you to come with an open heart and mind.

Please bring your sacred objects so that we may use them to call forth clarity and light.

We invite you to arrive at 7:30 pm we will spend 30 minutes with introductions to the meaning of the ritual and then we enter into the sacred space. If you arrive during the ritual please come into the space quietly so as not to disturb the energies of the group.

This event is donation based.
item.name: Full Moon Gathering
